ground_truth.thought: 收集关于软件开发行业的人才需求、项目成功率、技术创新成果和市场口碑的信息
ground_truth.name: IndustryInsight.get_software_development_insights

origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'IndustryInsight.get_software_development_insights', 'description': 'Collect insights on talent demand, project success rates, technological innovations, and market reputation in the software development industry.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'q', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The query term for the software development industry.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'talent_demand', 'description': 'The current talent demand in the software development industry.'}, {'name': 'project_success_rates', 'description': 'The average project success rates of software development companies.'}, {'name': 'technological_innovations', 'description': 'A list of recent technological innovations by software development companies.'}, {'name': 'market_reputation', 'description': 'The market reputation of selected software development companies.'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
我是一名软件工程师，对实体经济中的软件开发行业非常感兴趣。首先，我需要获取软件开发行业的人才需求状况。然后，我想查询5家软件开发企业的项目成功率。接着，我需要收集这些企业的技术创新成果。最后，我希望评估这些企业的市场口碑。当前这一步的目标是什么?
收集关于软件开发行业的人才需求、项目成功率、技术创新成果和市场口碑的信息
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
当前工具的参数'q'的值是什么?

{'talent_demand': 'High demand for software engineers with skills in AI, cloud computing, and mobile development.', 'project_success_rates': 'The average project success rate for the top 5 software development companies is 85%.', 'technological_innovations': ['Blockchain-based data management systems', 'AI-driven customer service chatbots', 'Cloud-native application development frameworks', 'Real-time data analytics platforms', 'Virtual reality training simulations'], 'market_reputation': 'All selected companies have a positive market reputation, with high customer satisfaction and strong industry partnerships.'}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'talent_demand': 'High demand for software engineers with skills in AI, cloud computing, and mobile development.', 'project_success_rates': 'The average project success rate for the top 5 software development companies is 85%.', 'technological_innovations': ['Blockchain-based data management systems', 'AI-driven customer service chatbots', 'Cloud-native application development frameworks', 'Real-time data analytics platforms', 'Virtual reality training simulations'], 'market_reputation': 'All selected companies have a positive market reputation, with high customer satisfaction and strong industry partnerships.'}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?

prediction: 评估软件开发企业的市场口碑。
